titleStmt.title: Prince Charles his vvelcome from Spaine: who landed at Portsmouth on Sunday the fift of October, and came safely to London on Munday the sixt of the same, 1623. Wtih the triumphs of London for the same his happy ariuall. And the relation of such townes as are situate in the wayes to take poste-horse at, from the city of London to Douer: and from Calais through all France and Spaine, to Madrid, to the Spanish court..
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. E. for Iohn Wright, and are to be sold at the Signe of the Bible without Newgate.,

notesStmt.note: Portrait of Charles I facing t.p.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: the Signe of the Bible without Newgate.
